snippet: The N.H.L. is one step closer to establishing expansion teams in Las Vegas and Quebec City.
abstract: Ownership groups in Las Vegas and Quebec City submit expansion team applications to NHL.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. is one step closer to establishing expansion teams in Las Vegas and Quebec City.

headline.main: N.H.L. Receives Expansion Bids From Las Vegas and Quebec City
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Expansion Bids Submitted
